attributes.action: Set an example and stop spending money on New Year Fireworks and put the money to better use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have, like most of the country looked in awe at the marvelous fireworks display that London exibits every new year.  I understand that other countries do the same to mark the new year and that Britain feels that it has to do the same to keep up appearances, but i can't help but wonder if the money could be put to better use.  Surely there are more important things to think about, such as the NHS or pensioners fuel bills!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
